About Us
Located within the Orlando golf resort area, Celebration Golf Club delivers a golfing experience that can challenge the pros and yet offer a rewarding time for juniors and those just learning the game. Come enjoy one of Orlando’s premier golf facilities.

Meetings/Events
The Jones Room is an exceptional corporate event space that caters to a variety of professional needs. Designed to accommodate corporate events and meetings, it offers a private room with a capacity of 40 guests, making it an ideal choice for both intimate gatherings and business meetings. Whether you’re hosting a graduation party, baby shower, a birthday party or you’re looking for the perfect space for an upcoming presentation, a strategic planning session, or a team-building workshop, our Jones Room provides the perfect atmosphere for productive discussions. Its well-appointed amenities and facilities ensure your events are not only successful but also memorable. Elevate your next gathering in a sophisticated and versatile setting, where our Jones Room’s commitment to excellence guarantees an impeccable experience for you and your guests. We look forward to hosting your next business meeting, company party, holiday party, bridal shower, graduation parties, and anything else we can celebrate with you!
Here at Celebration Golf Club, we are happy to offer :
Multiple floor plan options
Standard or customizable menus
Complimentary parking
Complimentary wireless internet
In house catering
Full-service bar
Hannah Huffer
Catering & Restaurant Manager
hhuffer@celebrationgolf.com
407-566-4653 ext. 4617

STAFF DIRECTORY
The Celebration Golf Club is owned, operated, and managed by people who are passionate about golf and achieving excellence. You can feel it on the course and you can see it in the clubhouse, Golf shop, and restaurant.
Every employee has a personal mission to provide you and your guests with the very best experience at Celebration Golf Club. Whether it is a round of golf, a corporate tournament, a banquet, or a wedding, we strive to make it outstanding. The only way to do that is to pay attention to you and the smallest details surrounding your tee time, golf lesson, wedding, or tournament. We want to make Celebration Golf Club a destination of choice, and to achieve that we promise to earn your loyalty one visit at a time.
Ryan Tamanini
General Manager
(407) 566-4653 ext. 4612
rtamanini@celebrationgolf.com
Ryan Burke
Superintendent
Brandon Ashe
Director of Golf

FL ELITE CARD RESERVATIONS
Online Store
Group Golf Events
Here at Celebration Golf Club have hosted more than 3,500 successful tournaments, making us central Florida’s #1 tournament venue. Our course offers a turnkey solution for all your tournament and golf outing needs. With meticulous attention to detail, we ensure that your golf event is executed flawlessly, from start to finish. Our location, just a stone’s throw away from Walt Disney World, provides not only convenience but also a picturesque backdrop for your tournament. Whether you’re organizing a corporate outing or a charity fundraiser, our experienced team will work closely with you to customize every aspect, from tee times to catering, to create an unforgettable golfing experience for your participants, or you’re looking to have a day of “no-frills” fun golf, a convention/corporate tournament, or an officially sanctioned 54-hole national championship, trust us to make your tournament a hole-in-one success.
We are happy to offer you our five-star tournament services including :
Full-time professional Golf Event Manager
A special committee, planning, and practice round rates available
Plush red carpeting from bag drop to registration
“Meet & Greet” for bus transportation at hotel by dedicated event staff
Printed scorecards and rules sheets (Customized)
Shuttle service to and from practice range
On-course skirted tables and chairs (as available)
On-course food and beverage stations
Golf Academy clinics and exhibitions
Set up of all on-course contests and skill events
Private indoor or outdoor food and beverage facilities
Please fill out an information request or direct any additional questions to
Jeff Magruder
Sales & Revenue Manager
jmagruder@celebrationgolf.com
407-566-4653 ext. 4621
